question: Which of the following is not a product under the Pradhan Mantri MUDRA Yojana (PMMY)?
explanation: Under the aegis of Pradhan Mantri MUDRA Yojana (PMMY), MUDRA has created three products i.e. 'Shishu', 'Kishore' and ‘Tarun’ as per the stage of growth and funding needs of the beneficiary micro unit. These schemes cover loan amounts as below:Shishu: covering loans up to Rs 50,000Kishore: covering loans above Rs 50,000 and up to Rs 5,00,000Tarun: covering loans above Rs 5,00,000 and up to  Rs 10,00,000
